turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hi, I'm trying to understand why my checking account balance is lower than I expected. I thought I had more money in there.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Hello! I can certainly help with that. To investigate, could you please verify the last four digits of your account number and your date of birth?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Sure, it's 1234 and my birthday is 01/01/1990. Okay, I've provided that...now what?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Thank you. One moment while I access your account information... Okay, I see a recent debit card transaction for $75 to 'Online Gaming Co.' on 2024-01-26, and an automatic payment to 'Streaming Service' for $15 on 2024-01-27. Does that explain the difference?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Ugh, the gaming company! I forgot about that. Okay, that explains some of it. But what about the rest? And, is there a way to see a detailed transaction history that breaks down every single expense?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Yes, a full transaction history is available. You can view it online by logging into your account on our website or through our mobile app. There you will find a comprehensive record of all account activity, including deposits, withdrawals, and payments. Regarding the remaining discrepancy, can you recall any other transactions from the past few days? It is possible there may have been pending transactions which have now cleared.
